languages.text: "Заключать сделки — безусловно. Сотрудничать — до определенной степени. Но не дарить же населенные людьми миры. Вы бы хоть {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Патент{/g} свой изучили повнимательнее. Помните — мудрость {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g} заключается в том, чтобы понимать: фраза "мне можно все" означает "мне можно почти все".

traits.locale_text: "Мудрость Вольного Торговца заключается в том, чтобы понимать: фраза "мне можно все" означает "мне можно почти все".

languages.text: "Strike deals — absolutely. Cooperate — to a degree. But not hand them inhabited worlds on a platter. I suggest you read your {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} more closely. Remember, the hallmark of a wise {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} is to realise that the phrase 'I can do anything' means 'I can do almost anything.'"
languages.original_text: "Заключать сделки — безусловно. Сотрудничать — до определенной степени. Но не дарить же населенные людьми миры. Вы бы хоть {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Патент{/g} свой изучили повнимательнее. Помните — мудрость {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g} заключается в том, чтобы понимать: фраза "мне можно все" означает "мне можно почти все".

traits.locale_text: "Strike deals — absolutely. Cooperate — to a degree. But not gift them populated worlds. I suggest you read your Warrant more thoroughly. Remember, the hallmark of a wise Rogue Trader is to realise that the phrase 'I may do as I please' means 'I may do most things as I please.'"

"Strike deals — absolutely. Cooperate — to a degree. But not gift them populated worlds. I suggest you read your Warrant more thoroughly. Remember, the hallmark of a wise Rogue Trader is to realise that the phrase 'I may do as I please' means 'I may do most things as I please.'"

"Strike deals — absolutely. Cooperate — to a degree. But not hand them inhabited worlds on a platter. I suggest you read your {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} more closely. Remember, the hallmark of a wise {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} is to realise that the phrase 'I can do anything' means 'I can do almost anything.'"

"Strike deals — absolutely. Cooperate — to a degree. But not hand them inhabited worlds on a platter. I suggest you read your {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} more closely. Remember, the hallmark of a wise {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} is to realise that the phrase 'I can do anything' means 'I can do almost anything.'"

"Strike deals — absolutely. Cooperate — to a degree. But not hand them inhabited worlds on a platter. I suggest you read your {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} more closely. Remember, the hallmark of a wise {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} is to realise that the phrase 'I can do anything' means 'I can do almost anything.'"

languages.text: 「取引か…そのとおりだ。協力はできる…ある程度だが。しかし奴らに住民のいる星をやすやすと渡すとは。お前の{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}令状{/g}をよく読むがいい。覚えておけ、思慮深い{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}の特徴とは、『私にはあらゆる行いが許されている』の一文を、『私にはほとんどの行いが許されている』と読めることだ」
languages.original_text: "Strike deals — absolutely. Cooperate — to a degree. But not hand them inhabited worlds on a platter. I suggest you read your {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} more closely. Remember, the hallmark of a wise {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} is to realise that the phrase 'I can do anything' means 'I can do almost anything.'"

traits.locale_text: 「取引か…そのとおりだ。協力はできる…ある程度だが。しかし奴らに住民のいる星をやすやすと渡すとは。お前の{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}令状{/g}をよく読むがいい。覚えておけ、思慮深い{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}の特徴とは、『私にはあらゆる行いが許されている』の一文を、『私にはほとんどの行いが許されている』と読めることだ」

languages.original_text: "Strike deals — absolutely. Cooperate — to a degree. But not hand them inhabited worlds on a platter. I suggest you read your Warrant more closely. Remember, the hallmark of a wise Rogue Trader is to realise that the phrase 'I can do anything' means 'I can do almost anything.'"

languages.text: “做交易？没问题。某种程度上的合作？也可以。然而。这不意味着你可以将整个殖民世界拱手相让。我建议你再仔细读读你的{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}授状{/g}。聪明的{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}应该会明白，‘可以做任何事’的意思，实际上是‘几乎可以做任何事’。”
languages.original_text: "Strike deals — absolutely. Cooperate — to a degree. But not hand them inhabited worlds on a platter. I suggest you read your {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} more closely. Remember, the hallmark of a wise {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} is to realise that the phrase 'I can do anything' means 'I can do almost anything.'"

traits.locale_text: “做交易？没问题。某种程度上的合作？也可以。然而。这不意味着你可以将整个殖民世界拱手相让。我建议你再仔细读读你的{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}许可证{/g}。聪明的{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}应该会明白，‘可以做任何事’的意思，实际上是‘几乎可以做任何事’。”

languages.text: «¿Llegar a acuerdos? Desde luego. ¿Cooperar? Hasta cierto punto. Pero no entregarles en bandeja mundos habitados. Le sugiero que lea más atentamente su {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Patente{/g}. Recuerde que lo que diferencia a un{mf||a} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g} sabi{mf|o|a} es que es consciente de que la frase "Puedo hacer cualquier cosa" en realidad significa "Puedo hacer casi cualquier cosa"».
languages.original_text: "Strike deals — absolutely. Cooperate — to a degree. But not hand them inhabited worlds on a platter. I suggest you read your {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} more closely. Remember, the hallmark of a wise {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} is to realise that the phrase 'I can do anything' means 'I can do almost anything.'"

traits.locale_text: «¿Llegar a acuerdos? Desde luego. ¿Cooperar? Hasta cierto punto. Pero no entregarles en bandeja mundos habitados. Le sugiero que lea más atentamente su {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Patente{/g}. Recuerde que lo que diferencia a un{mf||a} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g} sabi{mf|o|a} es que es consciente de que la frase "Puedo hacer cualquier cosa" en realidad significa "Puedo hacer casi cualquier cosa"».

languages.text: « Conclure des accords, oui. Coopérer, oui, jusqu'à un certain degré. Mais il n'a jamais été question de leur offrir des mondes habités sur un plateau. Vous devriez relire plus attentivement votre {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}lettre de marque{/g}, à l'occasion. N'oubliez pas que les meilleurs {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}libres-marchands{/g} sont ceux qui ont compris que "Je peux faire ce que je veux" signifie en fait "Je peux faire presque tout ce que je veux". »
languages.original_text: "Strike deals — absolutely. Cooperate — to a degree. But not hand them inhabited worlds on a platter. I suggest you read your {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} more closely. Remember, the hallmark of a wise {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} is to realise that the phrase 'I can do anything' means 'I can do almost anything.'"

traits.locale_text: « Conclure des accords, oui. Coopérer, oui, jusqu'à un certain degré. Mais il n'a jamais été question de leur offrir des mondes habités sur un plateau. Vous devriez relire plus attentivement votre {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}lettre de marque{/g}, à l'occasion. N'oubliez pas que les meilleurs libres-marchands sont ceux qui ont compris que "Je peux faire ce que je veux" signifie en fait "Je peux faire presque tout ce que je veux". »

languages.text: "Abkommen schließen – absolut. Kooperieren – begrenzt. Aber nicht, ihnen bewohnte Welten auf einem Tablett zu präsentieren. Ich schlage vor, Ihr studiert Euren {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Handelsbrief{/g} etwas genauer. Vergesst nicht, einen weisen {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändler{/g} erkennt man daran, dass er weiß, dass 'Ich darf alles' in Wahrheit 'Ich darf fast alles' bedeutet."
languages.original_text: "Strike deals — absolutely. Cooperate — to a degree. But not hand them inhabited worlds on a platter. I suggest you read your {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} more closely. Remember, the hallmark of a wise {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} is to realise that the phrase 'I can do anything' means 'I can do almost anything.'"

traits.locale_text: "Abkommen schließen – absolut. Kooperieren – begrenzt. Aber nicht, ihnen bewohnte Welten auf einem Tablett zu präsentieren. Ich schlage vor, Ihr studiert Euren {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Handelsbrief{/g} etwas genauer. Vergesst nicht, einen weisen {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändler{/g} erkennt man daran, dass er weiß, dass 'Ich darf alles' in Wahrheit 'Ich darf fast alles' bedeutet."

languages.text: "Anlaşma imzalamak: Kesinlikle. İş birliği yapmak: Belli ölçülerde. İçinde medeniyetlerin yaşadığı dünyaları onlara gümüş tabak içinde sunmak ise bambaşka bir şey. {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Ruhsatname'ni{/g} daha dikkatli okumanı öneririm. Unutma: Bilge {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g}, 'her şeyi yapabilirim' ifadesinin aslında 'neredeyse her şeyi yapabilirim' anlamına geldiğinin farkında olandır."
languages.original_text: "Strike deals — absolutely. Cooperate — to a degree. But not hand them inhabited worlds on a platter. I suggest you read your {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} more closely. Remember, the hallmark of a wise {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} is to realise that the phrase 'I can do anything' means 'I can do almost anything.'"

traits.locale_text: "Anlaşma imzalamak: Kesinlikle. İş birliği yapmak: Belli ölçülerde. İçinde medeniyetlerin yaşadığı dünyaları onlara gümüş tabak içinde sunmak ise bambaşka bir şey. {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Ruhsatname{/g}'ni daha dikkatli okumanı öneririm. Unutma: Bilge bir {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g}, 'her şeyi yapabilirim' kısmının aslında 'neredeyse her şeyi yapabilirim' anlamına geldiğinin farkında olandır."
